website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if you're looking for a smaller and less expensive basic LED monitor.
pros: Power consumption is 14 watts, with a 5 ms response time
Super slim profile with a nice overall look
Comes with both VGA and DVI-D cables
cons: Monitor is not VESA compliant (no wall mounting)
Some reports of this monitor arriving damaged or defective
Stand is small and on the cheap side

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware - may be open box item.  Did not work out of box
customer_reviews.text: ACER packaging was what looked like an open box item with stickers or tape over original stickers and lots of messy tape/well worn box (as it had been repackaged and retaped). Amazon packaging very sloppy also. If it was open box, it should have been labeled and priced accordingly. To add insult to injury, monitor did not work out of the box. A waste of my time to repackage and send back
customer_reviews.author: wa5pho

customer_reviews.title: Cheep, poor visual quality, difficult-impossible to adjust
customer_reviews.text: The good news, it came out of the box and was easy to install. Downhill from there. The stand is flimsy and wobbles - appears unstable. The screen is blurry and very bright/white. I have been search how to adjust the brightness, the instructions are terrible and I cannot find help online. I guess I got what a paid for! It is cheep and it is CHEEP. I will go blind looking at this screen! Dont buy it, spend a little more and get better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Good for a desktop application. Not intended for a gaming monitor.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent monitor if you're looking for a desktop application. If you're searching for a gaming monitor then I would skip on this one. Why no complaints about the screen quality there's nothing is going to blow you away and I certainly wouldn't want to use it to watch the latest movies screen quality and Graphics is what I'm into. But if you're looking for a solid monitor for your desktop computer then it's hard to go wrong with an Acer product. PROS - excellent price in screen quality for a desktop application. CONS - if looking for a gaming or a movie monitor than I would look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Franzke

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: I just set this monitor up with my work laptop. I wanted a second screen for use at home. I am reserving one star since I have only had it on for 5 minutes, so couldn't possibly comment on longevity, but I am really pleased with it out of the box. Easy to put together. People complained that they could not tilt the screen, but I had no problem tilting it to my needs. Just gripped either side and eased it into position. Color is good for excel, WORD and all that work stuff. The 19.5 inch is perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: JustGot2SayIt

customer_reviews.title: No camera or microphone
customer_reviews.text: Monitor is a good buy , so I thought. I discovered today, while my grand daughter was trying to do a school Skype class, that the monitor does not have a camera or microphone. I am not going to return it , because I did not read all the specifications and customer questions, so it’s my fault. It is a good monitor nonetheless, it has good sound and bright colors. So here I go having to spend extra money on a camera with a built in microphone. The old saying too good to be true, bit me again.
customer_reviews.author: tativ

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: It isn't the biggest screen, or the brightest, but I wasn't looking for the biggest or brightest screen. It feels a little more horizontal than it should, I'll grant you that, but given the price, it works a dream. May be worth the extra $50 bucks to get an extra inch or two, but given this is a starter screen for my son's first PC, it's a beaut.
customer_reviews.author: Jessee Derringer

customer_reviews.title: Solid second monitor
customer_reviews.text: I had a secondary monitor burn out on me and just wanted something inexpensive to replace it. This monitor has worked well. I don't run any games on it since my primary is an HP omen 144Hz gaming monitor so I don't know how it will perform running games that require high frame rates but youtube videos play on it without any issues and look good.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Acer is aces!
customer_reviews.text: We now own two Acer PCs (Luv 'em!), & this low end monitor(essentially VGA). VGA is retro & the plugs are friendlier to deal with. Whattya expext dudes for >$100? HDMI? Then ya got champagne taste on a beer budet. This l'il monitor allows us to boot up w/ a wired mouse & keyboard, then project to an HDMI 50 in Roku TV, switch to a wireless mouse & keyboard, segue to our sofa, stretch out on our posterior, then cruise. Life is indeed sweet! ;-D
customer_reviews.author: KeoniBoy

customer_reviews.title: Best value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Acer 19.5" LED Monitor: I did my research before purchasing and Acer is known for the value and they have not disappointed me yet. The monitor arrived in new condition as pictured and with all required connection hardware, including both a DVI and VGA cable. The picture quality is perfect for basic software applications and internet use, but I don't do the "gaming" thing so I can't comment there. I would recommend this monitor and I will definitely by Acer again.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Very nice monitor
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with this monitor . It fits perfectly in my desk , right behind a shelf . That's why I chose this low height size . Plus, the width makes up for the height , making a nice overall size . Nice screen , colors , brightness .
customer_reviews.author: Lupito

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth The Low Cost
customer_reviews.text: There weeks into using the monitors (I own two) and they started flickering constantly. It has become so bad I cannot use them any longer. Not worth the low cost, considering they only lasted for three weeks and now I must dispose of them and find better monitors. It would be best to invest in a higher quality monitor. This problem was isolated to these monitors. None of the others I use at an alternate work site have the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: The Incredible Sock

customer_reviews.title: It tilts!
customer_reviews.text: This monitor works great for me. Also, one thing that confused me were the reviews talking about lack of a tilt or having to unscrew things to get it to tilt. Not the case on the monitor that I received. It can tilt from the a slightly downward position until about 15 degrees upward. About the standard tilt I have always had on a monitor. You do have to hold the base with light pressure while you tilt it because the monitor is so light, but it is hard to believe that would fool some people. Perhaps they upgraded it? I almost didn't buy this monitor because of those reviews, but glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Otto

customer_reviews.title: Acer LED Computer Monitor
customer_reviews.text: My last Monitor was a 10 year old Acer that quit running but I like Acer and bought this one to replace that one, so far I have no complaints. I saw other on this product giving some bad review so I thought I would give this good review.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Alan Marx

customer_reviews.title: Great secondary monitor
customer_reviews.text: It does everything I need it to do, all for a great price. I use it as a secondary monitor to my gaming monitor. Of course, this monitor isn't the best for gaming, but it is great for having a second screen when multitasking. No hdmi output, just a reminder.
customer_reviews.author: Shahein R. Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Unable to adjust the contrast.
customer_reviews.text: As happens so often, the booklet that comes with this has zero actual instructions on how to work the controls. The controls, for whatever they are worth, are hidden under the edge of the case and they would be MUCH more useful if they could be seen. I'll have to experiment and see if I can figure out how they work. The display is far, FAR too bright, but so far I can see no way to adjust it. I didn't think I would like the wide view, but it is actually awesome. Glad I chose this one instead of the square monitor I'm used to.
customer_reviews.author: MamaLiberty

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied out time money and a monitor.  How to get this corrected with Amazon assp. Its been long enough and I have tried en
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't connect to anything else I have. I have taken it to 2 tech companies as well as best buy and they have no cords available for this product. Have tried for months. Completely disappointed to spend this much time and money and I am no better off and still without a monitor. Wondering how Amazon is going to help me fix this issue.
customer_reviews.author: lori stone

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor for the price. I researched a lot before buying this one for my son since his ended with an untimely demise. As soon as it arrived I hooked it up and worked perfectly. The screen lit immediately and I had no issues. The package also included a driver disc, specs and manual along with the cables. Despite the resolution the monitor is clear and images are crisp. For this price, I would highly recommend this monitor for those in a budget.
customer_reviews.author: doggysca

customer_reviews.title: Solid Smaller Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Wide, solid, perfect. It is just small enough to sit as a side bar with my graphics and media to my main display. Notice. Theres no adjusting this monitor. No tilt. No raise. I recommend getting it if that isn't an issue for you. It wasn't for me due to the side shelf height.
customer_reviews.author: Sera

customer_reviews.title: Great resolution! Expectation exceeded!
customer_reviews.text: I got this monitor for work. The program we use most seems to be getting “wider” with the new Office 365 format. I like not having to scroll across to see the right side of the displayed page. Just exactly what I expected. I didn’t expect to see such great resolution for the price, though! The display is so crisp and the colors are true. I am pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: The screen is fine, the only reason I gave three stars was ...
customer_reviews.text: The screen is fine, the only reason I gave three stars was after only 3 Days the VGA cable failed, and I had to go buy a new one and the only one available was almost $20.00. So added cost and the aggravation of having to go to a store, I could not wait to order one , I needed one that day. So as far as the monitor, I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Meadows

customer_reviews.title: It's ok and works for the price....
customer_reviews.text: It's an inexpensive 19" monitor...under $90 shipped. Works and it's good for LARGE resolutions but anything tighter than 1600x900 on this monitor is like ants on the wall...too small to see. I also had a bad VGA cable in the box...I was using DVI anyway... It's ok...and worth what I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Jay RaxterTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for..
customer_reviews.text: These monitors are ancient technology visually. Definately do not recommned for looking at anything relating to space... science fiction movies, video games etc.. very dissapointed. Blacks appear blue, orange is almost blinding to poor color balance. Yes they are cheap, and they will feel cheap when you look at them also.
customer_reviews.author: Jarod

customer_reviews.title: DVI and VGA cable included - but not made clear in the product description
customer_reviews.text: Good price, value. However, there was no indication what accessories (power plug, connector cable, etc.) were included which led me to separately purchase a DVI cable. It says that it is "DVI and VGA compatible" but does not say what is included. There were both a VGA and DVI included. Though I'm happy that I can return the DVI cable I bought for a refund I would have preferred a complete description so I would not have to go through the trouble to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: BVega

customer_reviews.title: Malfunctioning
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Acer G206HQL bd 19.5-Inch LED Computer Monitor Back-Lit Widescreen Display in June 2018. I got prmpt delivery through Amazon Prime. It is connected to my HP CPU in the kitchen and is used for some browsing, emails etc, it was working well until recently. However, after 8 months the monitor display started with color changing, blinking, too much bright and fades away etc. I am contacting Acer to see how will this be resolved. Will update wity further comments later.
customer_reviews.author: Rege Kuriakose

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I could not be more unhappy with Amazon right now. I purchased two monitors for the back room of my office. Two IDENTICAL monitors. Finally went to unpack and set them up and they are NOT identical - they are completely different models. In addition, they are different heights with different bases. To add insult to injury, neither has built-in audio - which almost ALL monitors have. I guess the only way to prevent this from happening in the future - to anyone - would be to read the hundreds of reviews from other unsatisfied customers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor.
customer_reviews.text: Love this monitor. I work at home sometimes using a laptop. I was able to connect this to my laptop to give me 2 separate independent screens that I am accustomed to at work. My work laptop is smaller so having a larger screen for main viewing was great. I can draw an image from one screen to the other.
customer_reviews.author: jade324

customer_reviews.title: Great... NOT (update from 5mo later)
customer_reviews.text: I like it UPDATE: for this monitor in August... 5 months later I’m getting weird lines on the monitor and monitor keeps going in and out. Not sure what’s happening to the monitor - WATCH IUT!
customer_reviews.author: J. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor for the price and has a good widescreen display
customer_reviews.text: Our monitor for our current desktop went out and we needed a quick and inexpensive replacement. This Acer monitor works great and had a good quality display. my only critique is that the standby light when the monitor is on but CPU is off blinks really bright blue. So now we turn out monitor off every night instead of leaving it in stand-by mode.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for extending my laptop screen in the home office
customer_reviews.text: The 19.5 inch screen is just big enough, but not a monster... satisfactory for work applications like spreadsheets and other documents. That’s all I need it for, and a screaming deal @ 69 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Panzer

customer_reviews.title: The good: The monitor is cheap yet the picture is ...
customer_reviews.text: The good: The monitor is cheap yet the picture is high-quality. The bad: The power cable for the AC adapter fell apart after about six months (not a problem, easy and cheap to replace) but, more troubling, the monitor started turning off randomly after about 20 months. I thought this was another problem with the AC adapter, so got another one, but the problems continued. Unfortunately, now it's *just* past the warranty point so I'll have to get another monitor, but definitely not one of these again.
customer_reviews.author: Skylar S Thompson

customer_reviews.title: No HDMI?
customer_reviews.text: Monitor works great on my computer. Easy to setup. However, I'm a little confused on how it can get full HD without an HDMI port (maybe that's why I'm seeing recommendations for a DVI to HDMI cable?). Speaking of the output, currently using VGA and I notice some refresh rate artifacts (shimmering in one part of the screen). I don't always notice it, and I think it has to do with my choice of desktop wallpaper. Good monitor for everyday use, wouldn't recommend it to someone who wants the best out of their monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Timber

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and works well
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this during the quarantine since I work from home and it's a good size and also easy to set-up
customer_reviews.author: Nina Baluyot

customer_reviews.title: The screen height and angle do not adjust
customer_reviews.text: The screen has a decent picture. However, it does not raise up, and you cannot tilt the screen enough to get the proper viewing angle. Unless you have a desk that is the exact perfect height for your eye level, I would highly suggest a screen that is adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention as it’s not an HDMI but rather DVI ...
customer_reviews.text: Pay attention as it’s not an HDMI but rather DVI. So if using with a laptop you will probably need a DVI yo HDMI cable.
customer_reviews.author: K. A. Donk

customer_reviews.title: A great third monitor for work
customer_reviews.text: Item was as described. Have same model attached to laptop. Was able to purchase and HDMI adapter and add this monitor on as well. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: eewdad

customer_reviews.title: Two factors keep me from giving it five stars: ...
customer_reviews.text: Two factors keep me from giving it five stars: the screen is about an inch too short. This means the Send button on my screen is below the screen, so I always have to move the screen down. I'd also rather, when it opens, it doesn't start with ACER, then ENERGY SAVING on the screen. When I turn it on I want to get right to my email. K.W.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Whittaker

customer_reviews.title: Good As For The MeanTime
customer_reviews.text: Smaller but my 88yrs ol mom likes it. So it is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for smaller desk
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a small monitor for a smaller desk this is the one for you! Fits perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Naomi J.

customer_reviews.title: Fast, and reliable. I bought 3!
customer_reviews.text: I got one of these for a christmas gift to go along with a computer I had got. I loved it so much that I went out and bought two more! These monitors are great for people in small work area. Pros. -Light weight -Can be wall mounted. -Supports DVI and VGA -5ms Response time Cons. -No HDMI I would highly recommend this monitor!
customer_reviews.author: Sean D.

customer_reviews.title: This is a really nice monitor for what I'm using it for attaching it ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice monitor for what I'm using it for attaching it to my laptop so I can work on my new book it is really nice to have everything so sharp and the colors are very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrenzo Manza

customer_reviews.title: Cant beat the price. Great durability
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 of these over the years for installing surveillance systems. Great picture and can hold up in cold and hot environments
customer_reviews.author: Robert G

customer_reviews.title: No headline
customer_reviews.text: Nice monitor, but I needed it to work on a KVM switch and it will not.
customer_reviews.author: Loney

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This monitor keeps the check-in station in our Cape Cod B&B working. It is a crucial piece of equipment for our business and we're entirely satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Cambridge Living

customer_reviews.title: A decent monitor
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new monitor and ordered this one. It is a fairly good one and I expect it will work for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: MayaTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Value for Money
customer_reviews.text: clean and crisp visuals brought this item for my desktop computer and it is working well. Great for the price
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and functional
customer_reviews.text: Affordable and functional for an extra monitor. Would like to be able to adjust height but it didn’t say it could do that so all is good. Good picture and size.
customer_reviews.author: Laura H

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected
customer_reviews.text: Have to get use to this size and shape had a square monitor before
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Nice wide bright display
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for, the monitor does not raise and lower. Hard to setup my ergonomic workspace with this monitor so low on the desk. Nice wide bright display. Simple to setup and put together. Really no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Quiet Storm

customer_reviews.title: I wish it had a camera!
customer_reviews.text: The monitor is great. I just wish it had a camera. The picture is great. I forgot I needed a camera also.
customer_reviews.author: Chequita Y Webb

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use when I work from home and it does the job. It doesn’t move up and down like I’d hope.
customer_reviews.author: Amber K

customer_reviews.title: Overall for the price I'm very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: There's one or two little pixel or pinholes or whatever, but they don't show up when there's something up on the screen. Overall for the price I'm very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Ritter

customer_reviews.title: Has Speakers But...
customer_reviews.text: If your desktop doesn't have a DVI connection this monitor is not for you. It has speakers but no audio port or HDMI connection.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Hutchins

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FIT
customer_reviews.text: this is a excellent computer monitor with great LED picture quality. no problems. good fit for a computer desk
customer_reviews.author: Ken T.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and good price
customer_reviews.text: I used 2 monitors for working at home, great quality with nice price. No issue at all. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: SnowSnow

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: SUPER EASY TO SET UP AND FOR THE PRICE IT IS A GREAT DEAL, THE ONLY THING IT DOES NOT HAVE IS BUILT IN SPEAKERS, WHICH WOULD BE A PLUS, BUT FOR THE PRICE, A GREAT SCREEN!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory B.

customer_reviews.title: Acer 19.5" wide screen monitor
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice wide screen monitor. It has a shiney bezel, and it has VGA and DVI connections. It has great resolution for watching dvds or movies, or gaming on your computer. Although it's a nice monitor, at a great price,( appx $79) I returned it because of the size and lack of tilt feature that I needed.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Needed to replace an old monitor and didn't want to spend a ton. Didn't really care about to specs, just needed something that worked and looked decent. This item is above average for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Joona Lee

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT HAVE HDMI PORT!
customer_reviews.text: The description of this product was a little vague when it came to whether or not it would have HDMI port or not. IT DOES NOT!
customer_reviews.author: CombatActionDad

customer_reviews.title: 19.5" model is advertising a false resolution
customer_reviews.text: I ordered "Style: Full HD (1920 x 1080)" but it only does 1600x900 for the 19.5 in model. Lame. But it works and it's dirt cheap, so I can't complain too much.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with Win10
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is basically obsolete unless you use older OS, Win7 or Win8. It is not compatible with Win10.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: I love Acer, though
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged. Sent it back only because it didn't have the mount in the back for my triple monitor stand. I love Acer, though. After sending it back, bought a similar Acer that had what I needed. Been using them since 2006 or so. Solid stuff.
customer_reviews.author: SCdane

customer_reviews.title: Very fuzzy.  Get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised this is rated so highly. The resolution is terrible. Its very fuzzy looking. I regret buying it and wish i would have just paid more for a real monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful monitor but once hooked up it conflicted with my Bose speakers on my computer.
customer_reviews.author: L. Brown

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: have had for just over 2 months, green vertical line runs the length of the monitor ,amazon support told me it was a hardware issue and since my return policy was up by a week there was nothing they could do for me , passing me off onto the manufacturer.all this for an $80 monitor ?? guess thats why theyre worth billions , i wont be renewing my prime
customer_reviews.author: john munyan

customer_reviews.title: The splash screens are a little dated-looking, but...
customer_reviews.text: I really like how crisp and thin this thing is. And the tilt's nice and easy. It's light and relatively compact for a widescreen which is perfect for my setup right now.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done, no real bells, whistles or high fidelity image reproduction.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good display for business class users who are not looking fo rhigh fidelity/color reproduction. There is a bit of a white washout to the image. Overall, value for your dollar this gets the job done just fine.
customer_reviews.author: David PAmazonTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Great to use Vertically
customer_reviews.text: I bought this screen as a second monitor to mount vertically beside my larger desktop monitor. It works perfectly. It does NOT have the standard 4 holes in back to mount an articulating arm, so I modified a guitar stand to hold it! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: WKing

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with this monitor. It came fast, hooked up easily. Seems like good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Mcclamrock

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor.
customer_reviews.text: ***NOT LED, the user manual and the carton identify this as an LCD monitor*** See the attached photo But, it gives a bright, crystal clear, high resolution monitor. I installed it within 3 minutes. I used the included VGA cable.
customer_reviews.author: Florida

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Way to complicated to set up. Didn't know what plugged in where so i returned it XD
customer_reviews.author: joey

customer_reviews.title: Cords included, easy set up, great bargain buy.
customer_reviews.text: These absolutely come with all the cords. Not sure why there is doubt about this fact. Monitor is as discussed...clear picture, great price, easy to set up. Plug it in and go.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Set up is easy breezy
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor for good price and easy set up. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Smith

customer_reviews.title: no HDMI port
customer_reviews.text: works as advertised, should definitely be more clear that there is NO HDMI PORT
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Looking Good! (and the monitor looks nice too)
customer_reviews.text: Clear display. Decent button lay-out. I use two of these for a duel monitor display. My only beef is that you can't adjust the height, but that's just a preference thing. Good monitor for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby SprinklesTop Contributor: Batman

customer_reviews.title: Good quality monitor
customer_reviews.text: The screen is clear and crisp. It took very little set up and the quality has not diminshed over the last three months.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: very pleased
customer_reviews.text: traded out an old monitor for my work - works great.
customer_reviews.author: Brock Shute

customer_reviews.title: easy set up
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my husband. He works from home sometimes, easy set up, screen is good, it comes with all the parts
customer_reviews.author: deshnee Annamalai

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with it. I had thought my HP monitor was as good as it gets. When it went bad, a friend urged me to try Acer as a better value. Not only was it economical, I was startled by the clarity and vivid color on the screen.
customer_reviews.author: KMcKay

customer_reviews.title: Decent screen, does not come with cables you need
customer_reviews.text: Got this as an alternate screen to my laptop when the coloring on it got screwed up. Screen arrived but did not have cable I needed to use it, and it does not have an HDMI port, so I had to go to a radioshack to get an HDMI-DVA cable, but now it works fine. A bit bulky
customer_reviews.author: Joshua M

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Needed dual Monitors for Home schooling with a DVI connector
customer_reviews.author: Old Timer

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: work well with my computer, very easy to assemble thanks
customer_reviews.author: ashaakir

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for a great monitor
customer_reviews.text: I have an older Acer myself (same size, older model number), and just bought this one for my parents (cheaper than I paid for mine 2 years ago). Updated them from an old 15" square monitor to this. For $80 you can't beat this one. It does tilt, and its resolution of 1600 X 900 is great for both a primary or a secondary monitor. Packaging was great as well.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT C

customer_reviews.title: 19.5 inches of visual goodness
customer_reviews.text: Nice monitor. Clear images and easy set up. I had to adjust the brightness as stated in other reviews but once done we were good to go. This monitor does tilt and adjust. Very happy and expect to be for a long time to come.
customer_reviews.author: Jungle King

customer_reviews.title: Good product, reasonable price, nothing fancy,
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 3 of these, they have met the expectations of a simple, reasonable cost, simple, monitor, been installed and working for over a month now. There are no mounting screw ports on the back if you are building a multiple screen monitor system.
customer_reviews.author: hate this kind of posts

customer_reviews.title: Sharp.
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this monitor. It is crisp, clear, and well priced. I like how slim it is. It serves as a second monitor for my laptop. Sometimes I watch Netflix while I work and the picture is so sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne I.

customer_reviews.title: I'm using this as a second monitor to my laptop ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this as a second monitor to my laptop and it's so helpful. Make sure to buy the HDMI Input DVI Outpud adapter though.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Bad out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: This was defective right out of the box. Monitor would get power, but wouldn't display nothing at all. Could not even bring up the built in menu on the screen. It's going back.
customer_reviews.author: Marian Waldman

customer_reviews.title: not very pretty, and would love for it to be able ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well, not very pretty, and would love for it to be able to adjust height more easily.
customer_reviews.author: SKL

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive but works well. Uses separate power supply instead of standard computer power cable. Picture seems evenly bright across the surafce - edge to edge. Would buy again. I was not compensated for this review.
customer_reviews.author: PeeceeWizard

customer_reviews.title: Great For The Office
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several of these for my office, between last week and June of 2015. No issues with any of them. My staff likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph "Stix" Davis

customer_reviews.title: Everything included
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. All the adapters and cables are included, barring some unusual connection.
customer_reviews.author: boscobrains

customer_reviews.title: Acer is great as always, crystal clear HD
customer_reviews.text: Acer has always had good reliable products, writing this review from this wonderful monitor which is great for everything and gaming with HD resolution. It's a waste to get expensive monitors when ones like this provide just as good HD resolution. I have had it for a few months now and hasn't had a single issue!
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: Awesome monitor!
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous monitor does a lot and at a good price!
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD TURNBULL

customer_reviews.title: Good color and resolution. You get your money's worth.
customer_reviews.text: It's a cheap monitor, but very usable. Came in on time, fired right up, works just fine. The base is fixed, i.e. no height or tilt adjust on it, but you can stack it up on something easily enough. Great for second monitor. Definitely worth the small price paid.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome with our new Dell
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as stated. Arrived quick, safe and sound. Works awesome with our new Dell.
customer_reviews.author: Peg P.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty solid for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty solid for the price. Had one dead pixel on it when I got it otherwise I'd give 5 stars. All in all worth the money even with the dead pixel.
customer_reviews.author: Ben and Kate Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use as a second monitor when working at home.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Walczak

customer_reviews.title: I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This was larger than I anticipated. I'm a law student and I bought this monitor so that I would have an additional screen to use when researching. It serves its purpose well. I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Abby Louise

customer_reviews.title: she love bigger and more clear screen
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my daughter, she love bigger and more clear screen.
customer_reviews.author: AMart

customer_reviews.title: Easily Worth Your Money.
customer_reviews.text: Simple but sturdy base, with a very clear picture. Perfect size for my dual monitor desk.
customer_reviews.author: Monty R. Hughes

product_meta.title: Acer G206HQL bd 19.5-Inch LED Computer Monitor Back-Lit Widescreen Display
product_meta.description: Acer G206HQL monitor sports a super-slim profile with an X-shaped stand that lets it fit nicely in spaces of any size. Outstanding performance, eco-friendliness and smart use of energy complement the sleek design - all while staying well within budget. This Acer monitor showcases a 19.5" Widescreen LCD with impressive 1600 x 900 resolution that delivers excellent detail, making it perfect for widescreen HD gaming, multimedia and productivity applications. Enjoy widely available 16:9 HD digital content without image distortion on the expansive widescreen LCD. The remarkable 100 Million:1 contrast ratio ensures a crystal-clear viewing experience while rapid 5ms response time keeps moving images sharp. It also supports both VGA and DVI inputs offering greater compatibility. The Acer G206HQL LCD brings an amazing multimedia experience to your home with a widescreen cinematic view and a unique fighter pilot style. Dimensions (H x W x D):11.06 inch x 18.3 inch x 1.25 inch (without stand),13.14 inch x 18.3 inch x 6.57 inch(with stand). Never use it under sporting, exercising, or any vibrating environment which will probably cause unexpected short current or damage internal devices. Panel Technology - Twisted Nematic Film (TN Film). Viewing Angles 170 Degrees Horizontal, 160 Degrees Vertical.
feature_bullets: The stunning 19. 5" display with 1600 x 900 resolution delivers excellent detail, making it perfect for widescreen HD gaming, multimedia and productivity
Rapid 5ms response time reduces deviations in transition time to deliver high-quality moving images bringing immersive graphics to your movies and games
This monitor is not VESA mountable. Ports & Connectors- DVI-in, VGA. Power Consumption 14 Watts
The DVI-D input with High-bandwidth Digital Content Protection (HDCP) allows for viewing of digital movies and copy-protected media
Input Voltage- 110 V AC,220 V AC. Operating Power Consumption- 16.20 W. Standby Power Consumption-450 mW

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars683 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
